articles.title: Boeing Keeps Making Excuses to Push Back First Astronaut Launch - Futurism
articles.description: On Saturday, Boeing had to scrub the launch of its much-maligned astronaut shuttle once more, adding to years of technical mishaps and delays.
articles.content:
Try as it might, Boeing simply can't get its plagued Starliner spacecraft off the ground.
